page.title: 04LAW & ORDER, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Community Policing. Our policeman likes to come into school because it is important to talk to people particularly children. He walks around the village but not as much as he would like. The day we interviewed him he was involved in searching for an escaped prisoner from Acklington prison. He will spend some of his time doing paper work in the police office. He will then check with other constables to see if all is well. This afternoon he will interview a man about a theft. Many thefts from cars and caravans are being reported. Our policeman is married with a boy who is seven years old.
